## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.uniqueId property

Example of how to use the `idGenerator` to retrieve a unique ID. If the generator is available, it will return a dynamically generated ID. If not, it falls back to a default ID.

  

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected get uniqueId(): string;
```
